Teaching
text:
Below is the course I have taught at the University of Skoltech,Russia during independent period.



I30202437 Python for Data Science Pseudo-code. Program design and structure. Flow control. Iteration. Lists (arrays). Functions. File I/O. Classes, objects, methods, and libraries.

title: Teaching

Below is the course I have taught at the University of Skoltech,Russia during independent period.



I30202437 Python for Data Science Pseudo-code. Program design and structure. Flow control. Iteration. Lists (arrays). Functions. File I/O. Classes, objects, methods, and libraries.

title: Teaching
text:
Teaching Philosophy
I’ve learned that great teaching isn’t just about delivering content—it’s about creating the right conditions for learning to happen. My approach rests on three core pillars: sparking genuine motivation, building a supportive community, and staying flexibly responsive to my students’ needs. When I get these right, I see curiosity catch fire, collaboration flourish, and obstacles to learning start to fall away

title: Addisu A. Zena, Btech
text:
Bio
Addisu is a technology and biomedical enthusiast who holds a Bachelor’s degree in Electronics & Communication Engineering (ECE) and Biomedical Engineering from Vellore Institute of Technology (Class of 2022).
With a deep interest in programming, data science, and human anatomy and physiology, he continuously works on projects at the intersection of engineering, machine learning, and biomedical research. He is always expanding his skill set through hands-on learning and new technologies.
###Skills: - Python | MATLAB | LabVIEW
- Data Science | Machine Learning


Contact

title: Breast Cancer classification Using Machine Learning Classifier
text:
# import libraries
import pandas as pd # for data manupulation or analysis
import numpy as np # for numeric calculation
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt # for data visualization
import seaborn as sns # for data visualization
import pickle #for dumping the model or we can use joblib library


# Suppressing Warnings
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

title: Breast Cancer classification Using Machine Learning Classifier

title: Breast Cancer classification Using Machine Learning Classifier
Breast Cancer classification Using Machine Learning Classifier
text:
Suppor vector Classifier

# Support vector classifier
from sklearn.svm import SVC
svc_classifier = SVC()
svc_classifier.fit(X_train, y_train)
y_pred_scv = svc_classifier.predict(X_test)
accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred_scv)

0.9385964912280702



Train with Standard scaled Data

# Train with Standard scaled Data
svc_classifier2 = SVC()
svc_classifier2.fit(X_train_sc, y_train)
y_pred_svc_sc = svc_classifier2.predict(X_test_sc)
accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred_svc_sc)

0.9649122807017544

Scholarship interests
My scholarship interests lie at the intersection of data science and biomedical engineering.
